briefdescription.para: Get the number of registered integrators.

simplesect.para: Returns an integer that corresponds to the number of currently registered integrators.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of a registered integrator (e.g. cvode etc.)

parameterdescription.para: The index of the registered integrator

simplesect.para: Callee owns memory

briefdescription.para: Get the hint of a registered integrator (e.g. cvode etc.)

parameterdescription.para: The index of the registered integrator

simplesect.para: Callee owns memory

briefdescription.para: Get the description of a registered integrator (e.g. cvode etc.)

parameterdescription.para: The index of the registered integrator

simplesect.para: Callee owns memory

briefdescription.para: Get the number of instantiated integrators. \description To instantiate an integrator, use setCurrentIntegrator.

simplesect.para: Returns an integer that corresponds to the number of currently registered integrators.

briefdescription.para: Specify the current integrator to be used for simulation. \description This method instantiates a new integrator of the given type (e.g. cvode, gillespie) if one does not currently exist. Otherwise, the existing integrator of this type is used.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the integrator to be used.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Obtain a description of the current integrator.

simplesect.para: Returns a description of the current integrator.

briefdescription.para: Obtain a description of the current integrator.

simplesect.para: Returns a description of the current integrator.

briefdescription.para: Obtain a short hint for the current integrator.

simplesect.para: Returns a short hint of the current integrator.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of adjustable settings for the current integrator.

simplesect.para: Returns an integer that corresponds to the number of adjustable integrator settings.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of a parameter of the current integrator.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the parameter (0 <= n < getNumberOfCurrentIntegratorParameters)

briefdescription.para: Get the description of a parameter of the current integrator.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the parameter (0 <= n < getNumberOfCurrentIntegratorParameters)

briefdescription.para: Get the display name of a parameter of the current integrator.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the parameter (0 <= n < getNumberOfCurrentIntegratorParameters)

briefdescription.para: Get the hint of a parameter of the current integrator.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the parameter (0 <= n < getNumberOfCurrentIntegratorParameters)

briefdescription.para: Get the type of a parameter of the current integrator.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the parameter (0 <= n < getNumberOfCurrentIntegratorParameters)

briefdescription.para: Reset the integrator parameters to their default values.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Get the names of adjustable settings for the current integrator.

simplesect.para: Returns a list that contains the names of adjustable integrator settings.

briefdescription.para: Get the description for a specific integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns a description for the integrator setting.

briefdescription.para: Get the hint for a specific integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns a hint for the integrator setting.

briefdescription.para: Get the return type for a specific integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns a integer that indicates the return type for the integrator setting. 0-STRING, 1-BOOL, 2-INT32, 3-UINT32, 4-INT64, 5-UINT64, 6-FLOAT, 7-DOUBLE, 8-CHAR, 9-UCHAR, 10-EMPTY

briefdescription.para: Get the integer value for a specific integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns an integer value for the integrator setting.

briefdescription.para: Set the integer value for a specific integrator setting.

parameterdescription.para: The integer value for the integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Get the unsigned integer value for a specific integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns an integer value for the integrator setting.

memberdef.argsstring: (RRHandle handle, const char *parameterName, unsigned int value)
memberdef.name: setCurrentIntegratorParameterUInt

briefdescription.para: Set the unsigned integer value for a specific integrator setting.

parameterdescription.para: The integer value for the integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Get the double value for a specific integrator setting.

parameterdescription.para: The double value for the integrator setting.

parameterdescription.para: The string value for the integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Get the boolean value for a specific integrator setting.

briefdescription.para: Set the boolean value for a specific integrator setting.

parameterdescription.para: The boolean value for the integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Get the double array value for a specific integrator setting. Should only used for absoluate tolerace.

parameterdescription.para: Return the values as in this double array.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

memberdef.argsstring: (RRHandle handle, const char *parameterName, double *value, int len)
memberdef.name: setCurrentIntegratorParameterDoubleArray

briefdescription.para: Set the double array value for a specific integrator setting. Should only used for absoluate tolerace.

parameterdescription.para: The double array value for the integrator setting.
The length of given soubld array.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Set the scalar tolerance based on concentration for the current integrator.

parameterdescription.para: The double value for the integrator setting.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

briefdescription.para: Set the vector tolerance based on concentration for the current integrator.

parameterdescription.para: The double array value for the integrator setting.
The length of given soubld array.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.

The length of given soubld array.

simplesect.para: Returns True if successful.
